summary: IGNITION COIL CAUSED VEHICLED TO STALL.  AUDI AGREED TO REPLACE 1 COIL BUT SAID THEY DID NOT HAVE THE RESOURCES TO FIX THE OTHER 4.  WHEN ASKED IF IT WILL HAPPEN AGAIN I WAS TOLD "IT IS A CRAP SHOOT".  THE VEHICLE WAS SOLD TO ME DEFECTIVE AND I NOW CONSIDER IT "PARTIALLY FIXED".  IT IS A SAFETY HAZARD BEING AS IT STALLED IN THE MIDDLE OF I-95 LAST NIGHT.
